message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a framework for blocking adversarial attacks in text classification models. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves machine learning techniques such as embedding estimators and kNN search, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). As the paper deals with security and attacks, it could also be categorized under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper involves text classification, which could also fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) as text classification is a common task in natural language processing and computer vision.
